battery_unloaded_voltage.notes: Fresh alkaline pack measured with multimeter

led_chain_current.notes: Measured with meter; slightly dimmed due to meter series resistance; actual current a bit higher (~190–200 mA)

current_per_led.notes: LEDs are underdriven (10–20 mA typical), contributes to long lifespan

total_power_consumption.notes: P = V × I = 3.2 V × 0.18 A (reported ~0.58 W)

led_configuration.notes: Voltage and current match typical small battery LED chains

brightness.value: Slightly dimmer under meter load; normal when powered directly

safe_current_range.notes: Up to ~200 mA total; well within AAA and LED limits

general_note: Information obtained from testing and trialing using a 40-LED chain cut into 20. Provided for informational purposes only; no guarantee of accuracy, safety, or suitability for any particular use.
